articles.author: Thomas Ricker
articles.title: Veloretti Ace Two e-bike review: rarified heir
articles.description: The Veloretti Ace Two electric bike has a belt drive, removable battery, and smooth automatic shifting, and it’s built to be serviced anywhere. You might not be able to buy it, but you’ll want it anyway.
articles.content:
Belt drive, removable battery, smooth automatic shifting, and built to be serviced anywhere. This Dutch e-bike checks all the boxes.

articles.title: Hijack review – Idris Elba makes this beautifully daft plane thriller soar

articles.title: Environments: In welche Wüsten Apple Vision-Pro-Nutzer schickt
articles.description: Apple wird zum Start seiner Vision Pro über ein Dutzend professionell aufgezeichnete Panoramen mitliefern, in die man abtauchen kann. Hier die Liste.
